General.Name: P-Duke Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: P-Duke Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, sale, and servicing of DC/DC converters and related products in Europe, the United States, and Japan. It provides AC-DC power supplies, DC-DC converters, medical DC-DC and AC-DC solutions, and railway solutions, as well as surge suppression modules under the P-DUKE brand name. P-Duke Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.36, Taichung Industrial Park, Taichung, Taiwan, 40850
